title.narrative: PAMIESC COVID 19

description.narrative: mitigao do impacto dos efeitos negativos da Covid-19 na vida das famlias rurais vulneráveis, procurado salvaguardar os seus direitos económicos e sociais, através do reforo da sua capacidade produtiva e do acesso à informao e meios de preveno da pandemia. description.narrative: The overall objective of this action to increase food and nutrition security in Malawi. The project is aiming at increasing food and nutrition security, and alleviating the socio-economic impacts of COVID-19 amongst vulnerable populations, with a focus of ultra-poor households. The action will also aim at enhancing the resilience of chronically food insecure populations to food shocks and the effects of COVID-19, and generating opportunities for graduation out of extreme poverty.

title.narrative: Emergency Support for Human Rights Defenders in Exile Affected by the Covid19 Crisis

description.narrative: This action provides emergency, short terms support to the livelihoods of sixty human rights defenders (HRDs) living in exile in Kampala. It involves the provision of direct cash transfers to help HRDs meet their basic needs, including accommodation, clothing and food; and provision for psychosocial counselling for HRDs. The action also envisages a dialogue component with UNHCR and other key stakeholders in Uganda to ensure a more sustainable approach to supporting this key group of HRDs.
